body:
Comment 1 by **shahzeb**: 
I cloned the branch from http://code.google.com/p/gofrontend/ which has all the
missing 'runtime' files. Using these files in the original gccgo SVN snapshot solved
the problem of the missing files.

Though there is still one more error, the "mime" package imported in go/http/fs.go is
not found during compilation. So I commented out all references to this package and
let 'make'/'make install' complete. Then came back to go/http/fs.go, restored the
original file contents and did 'make'/'make install' again. No errors on the second pass.

- Shahzeb
